paper_abstract: Frequency hopping spread spectrum and direct sequence spread spectrum are two main spread coding technologies in communication systems. Frequency hopping sequences are needed in frequency hopping code-division multiple-access (FH-CDMA) systems. In this paper, four algebraic and a combinatorial constructions of optimal sets of frequency hopping sequences with new parameters are presented, and a number of bounds on sets of frequency hopping sequences are described.
paper_title: Sets of Frequency Hopping Sequences: Bounds and Optimal Constructions
